short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're sick of seeing Trump's stupid survey, this will click the opposite of what he wants and screw with this stats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you browse Facebook, you're in it to have laughs and talk to friends - not to be bombarded with stupid surveys by Donald Trump. Here is a browser extension that makes it easy to mess with his survey by filling in all the answers in a way he will hate. All you have to do it hit submit.
